credit_line: Gift of Mrs. Henry J. Bernheim
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 178 x 128 cm (5 ft. 10 1/16 in. x 50 3/8 in.)
title: Large panel of tapa cloth
medium:
Medium: Broussonetia bark
Technique: beaten bark fiber, rubbed and hand painted
description: Several thicknesses of white fabric made from beaten bark, painted in rust, brown, in design of three rows of rectangles enclosing striated angular forms. Rows are divided by stripes of diamond pattern.
name: Bark cloth
